contextId.information: It is understood that David sent messengers. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
It is understood that they should return to Jerusalem. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])

The missing words may be added to this question. Also, this rhetorical question is a request for Jehonadab to tell him why he is depressed. It may be written as a statement. AT: "Will you not tell me why you are depressed?" or "Please, tell me why you are depressed." (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]] and [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_rquestion]])
The missing words can be added to this phrase. AT: "because the people have made me afraid that I have come" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
contextId.quote: because the people have made me afraid

contextId.information: This is another place he may be hiding. AT: "or hidden in some other place" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
The missing word may be added. AT: "most peaceful and faithful cities in Israel" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
contextId.quote: most peaceful and faithful in Israel
